{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Icy Rock |image = [[File:Icy_Rock Updated.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Icy Rock''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Rare Hold Items]] *[[Dungeons]] |value = 2 {{Diamonds}} }} ==Description== The '''Icy Rock''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Icy Rock has a value of 2 [[Diamonds]] {{Diamonds}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Mine Layout== The Icy appears in the Underground as a 3x3 sized object.

[[File:IcyRockMine.png|100px]] ==Acquisition== Icy Rocks can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Weather Institute|2.25}} |} |}
